verses.verse: In the first <WH2298> year <WH8140> of Belshazzar <WH1113> king <WH4430> of Babylon <WH895> Daniel <WH1841> had <WH2370> a dream <WH2493> and visions <WH2376> of his head <WH7217> upon <WH5922> his bed <WH4903>: then <WH116> he wrote <WH3790> the dream <WH2493> and told <WH560> the sum <WH7217> of the matters <WH4406>.

340 <WH1841> spake <WH6032> and said <WH560>, I saw <WH2370> in my vision <WH2376> by <WH5974> night <WH3916>, and <WH718>, behold, the four <WH703> winds <WH7308> of heaven <WH8065> brake <WH1519> forth upon the great <WH7229> sea <WH3221>.
And four <WH703> great <WH7260> beasts <WH2423> came up <WH5559> from <WH4481> the sea <WH3221>, diverse <WH8133> one <WH1668> from <WH4481> another <WH1668>.

The first <WH6933> was like a lion <WH744>, and had eagle <WH5403>'s wings <WH1611>: I beheld <WH1934> till <WH5705> the wings <WH1611> thereof were plucked <WH4804>, and it was lifted up <WH5191> from <WH4481> the earth <WH772>, and made to stand <WH6966> upon <WH5922> two feet <WH7271> as a man <WH606>; and a man <WH606>'s heart <WH3825> was given to it <WH3052>.

And <WH718>, behold, another <WH317> beast <WH2423>, a second <WH8578>, like <WH1821> to a bear <WH1678>; and it was raised up <WH6966> on one <WH2298> side <WH7859>, and three <WH8532> ribs <WH5967> were in its mouth <WH6433> between <WH997> its teeth <WH8128>: and they said <WH560> thus <WH3652> unto it <WH6966>, Arise, devour <WH399> much <WH7690> flesh <WH1321>.

After <WH870> this <WH1836> I beheld <WH1934>, and <WH718>, lo, another <WH317>, like a leopard <WH5245>, which had upon <WH5922> its back <WH1355> four <WH703> wings <WH1611> of a bird <WH5776>; the beast <WH2423> had also four <WH703> heads <WH7217>; and dominion <WH7985> was given to it <WH3052>.

After <WH870> this <WH1836> I saw <WH1934> in the night <WH3916> - visions <WH2376>, and <WH718>, behold, a fourth <WH7244> beast <WH2423>, terrible <WH574> and powerful <WH8624>, and strong exceedingly <WH3493>; and it had great <WH7260> iron <WH6523> teeth <WH8128>; it devoured <WH399> and brake in pieces <WH1855>, and stamped <WH7512> the residue <WH7606> with its <WH1932> feet <WH7271>: and it <WH1932> was diverse <WH8133> from <WH4481> all <WH3606> the beasts <WH2423> that were before <WH6925> it <WH6236>; and it had ten horns <WH7162>.

I considered <WH1934> the horns <WH7162>, and <WH431>, behold, there came up <WH5559> among <WH997> them another <WH317> horn <WH7162>, a little <WH2192> one <WH6925>, before which three <WH8532> of <WH4481> the first <WH6933> horns <WH7162> were plucked up by the roots <WH6132>: and <WH431>, behold, in this <WH1668> horn <WH7162> were eyes <WH5870> like the eyes <WH5870> of a man <WH606>, and a mouth <WH6433> speaking <WH4449> great things <WH7260>.

I beheld <WH1934> till <WH5705> thrones <WH3764> were placed <WH7412>, and one that was ancient <WH6268> of days <WH3118> did sit <WH3488>: his raiment <WH3831> was white <WH2358> as snow <WH8517>, and the hair <WH8177> of his head <WH7217> like pure <WH5343> wool <WH6015>; his throne <WH3764> was fiery <WH5135> flames <WH7631>, and the wheels <WH1535> thereof burning <WH1815> fire <WH5135>.

A fiery <WH5135> stream <WH5103> issued <WH5047> and came forth <WH5312> from <WH4481> before <WH6925> him <WH506>: thousands of thousands <WH506> ministered <WH8120> unto him <WH7240>, and ten thousand times ten thousand <WH7240> stood <WH6966> before <WH6925> him <WH1780>: the judgment was set <WH3488>, and the books <WH5609> were opened <WH6606>.

I beheld <WH1934> at that time <WH116> because <WH4481> of the voice <WH7032> of the great <WH7260> words <WH4406> which the horn <WH7162> spake <WH4449>; I beheld <WH1934> even till <WH5705> the beast <WH2423> was slain <WH6992>, and its body <WH1655> destroyed <WH7>, and it was given <WH3052> to be burned <WH3346> with fire <WH785>.

And as for the rest <WH7606> of the beasts <WH2423>, their dominion <WH7985> was taken away <WH5709>: yet their lives <WH2417> were prolonged <WH3052> for <WH5705> a season <WH2166> and a time <WH5732>.

I saw <WH1934> in the night <WH3916> - visions <WH2376>, and <WH718>, behold, there came <WH858> with <WH5974> the clouds <WH6050> of heaven <WH8065> one like unto a son <WH1247> of man <WH606>, and he came <WH4291> even to <WH5705> the ancient <WH6268> of days <WH3118>, and they brought him near <WH7127> before him <WH6925>.

And there was given <WH3052> him dominion <WH7985>, and glory <WH3367>, and a kingdom <WH4437>, that all <WH3606> the peoples <WH5972>, nations <WH524>, and languages <WH3961> should serve <WH6399> him <WH7985>: his dominion is an everlasting <WH5957> dominion <WH7985>, which shall not <WH3809> pass away <WH5709>, and his kingdom <WH4437> that which shall not <WH3809> be destroyed <WH2255>.
As for me <WH576>, Daniel <WH1841>, my spirit <WH7308> was grieved <WH3735> in the midst <WH1459> of my body <WH5085>, and the visions <WH2376> of my head <WH7217> troubled me <WH927>.

I came near <WH7127> unto <WH5922> one <WH2298> of <WH4481> them that stood by <WH6966>, and asked <WH1156> him <WH4481> the truth <WH3330> concerning all <WH3606> this <WH1836>. So he told <WH560> me <WH3046>, and made me know the interpretation <WH6591> of the things <WH4406>.
These <WH459> great <WH7260> beasts <WH2423>, which <WH581> are four <WH703>, are four <WH703> kings <WH4430>, that shall arise <WH6966> out of <WH4481> the earth <WH772>.

But the saints <WH6922> of the Most High <WH5946> shall receive <WH6902> the kingdom <WH4437>, and possess <WH2631> the kingdom <WH4437> for <WH5705> ever <WH5957>, even for <WH5705> ever <WH5957> and ever <WH5957>.

Then <WH116> I desired <WH6634> to know the truth <WH3321> concerning <WH5922> the fourth <WH7244> beast <WH2423>, which was <WH1934> diverse <WH8133> from <WH4481> all <WH3606> of them <WH3493>, exceeding terrible <WH1763>, whose teeth <WH8128> were of iron <WH6523>, and its nails <WH2953> of brass <WH5174>; which devoured <WH399>, brake in pieces <WH1855>, and stamped <WH7512> the residue <WH7606> with its feet <WH7271>;

and concerning the ten <WH6236> horns <WH7162> that were on its head <WH7217>, and the other <WH317> horn which came up <WH5559>, and before <WH4481> which three <WH8532> fell <WH5308>, even that <WH1797> horn <WH7162> that <WH1797> had eyes <WH5870>, and a mouth <WH6433> that spake <WH4449> great things <WH7260>, whose look <WH2376> was more <WH4481> stout <WH7229> than <WH4481> its fellows <WH2273>.
I beheld <WH1934>, and the same <WH1797> horn <WH7162> made <WH5648> war <WH7129> with <WH5974> the saints <WH6922>, and prevailed against them <WH3202>;

until <WH5705> the ancient <WH6268> of days <WH3118> came <WH858>, and judgment <WH1780> was given <WH3052> to the saints <WH6922> of the Most High <WH5946>, and the time <WH2166> came <WH4291> that the saints <WH6922> possessed <WH2631> the kingdom <WH4437>.

Thus <WH3652> he said <WH560>, The fourth <WH7244> beast <WH2423> shall be <WH1934> a fourth <WH7244> kingdom <WH4437> upon earth <WH772>, which shall be diverse <WH8133> from <WH4481> all <WH3606> the kingdoms <WH4437>, and shall devour <WH399> the whole <WH3606> earth <WH772>, and shall tread it down <WH1759>, and break it in pieces <WH1855>.

And as for the ten <WH6236> horns <WH7162>, out of <WH4481> this kingdom <WH4437> shall ten <WH6236> kings <WH4430> arise <WH6966>: and another <WH321> shall arise <WH6966> after <WH311> them <WH8133>; and he shall be diverse from <WH4481> the former <WH6933>, and he shall put down <WH8214> three <WH8532> kings <WH4430>.

And he shall speak <WH4449> words <WH4406> against <WH6655> the Most High <WH5943>, and shall wear out <WH1080> the saints <WH6922> of the Most High <WH5946>; and he shall think <WH5452> to change <WH8133> the times <WH2166> and the law <WH1882>; and they shall be given <WH3052> into his hand <WH3028> until <WH5705> a time <WH5732> and times <WH5732> and half <WH6387> a time <WH5732>.
But the judgment <WH1780> shall be set <WH3488>, and they shall take away <WH5709> his dominion <WH7985>, to consume <WH8046> and to destroy <WH7> it unto <WH5705> the end <WH5491>.

And the kingdom <WH4437> and the dominion <WH7985>, and the greatness <WH7238> of the kingdoms <WH4437> under <WH8460> the whole <WH3606> heaven <WH8065>, shall be given <WH3052> to the people <WH5972> of the saints <WH6922> of the Most High <WH5946>: his kingdom <WH4437> is an everlasting <WH5957> kingdom <WH4437>, and all <WH3606> dominions <WH7985> shall serve <WH6399> and obey him <WH8086>.

Here <WH5705> is the end <WH5491> of the matter <WH4406>. As for me <WH576>, Daniel <WH1841>, my thoughts much <WH7690> troubled <WH927> me <WH5922>, and my countenance <WH2122> was changed <WH8133> in me <WH5922>: but I kept <WH5202> the matter <WH4406> in my heart <WH3821>.
